reviewText: I love hippos... I just think it is great to watch..

If you want to see great footage of hippos, this is not for you. If, however, you want to sleep without the aid of medications or alcohol, this video is likely to do the trick.

Snoozer - and somewhat strange music, to boot.

This had a lot of information and closeups of Hippos in their natural environment. With the hippo being the most territorial and deadliest of all animals to humans(they kill more humans per year than any other animal), I am surprised that the camera men got so close to them! I received this item very quickly and in perfect condition.
Grandkids loved it. We all did. It was informative and entertaining and fun to watch. Learned things I never knew.
My youngest grandson is only two and just loves hippos so he loves to watch this movie about his buddies---hippos.
